alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Yakutat; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 12 at 12:18PM AKST until December 12 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat, Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait, City and Borough of Sitka and Western Kupreanof Island and Kuiu Island. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Wind driven waves will cause flooding of lots, parks, and nearshore infrastructure around high tide. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Reports of small craft adrift and shoreline inundation have been received from law enforcement in Sitka. High tide occurred at approximately 11:30 am.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Yakutat; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
